pageContext.claim: “I simply want to get our great people $2000, rather than the measly $600 that is now in the bill. Also, stop the billions of dollars in 'pork.'”
pageContext.analysis: Referring to "pork" is a disingenuous complaint and suggests that Trump has barely bothered to understand the bill. The covid relief package  was combined with remaining annual spending bills. Many of these line items cited by Trump were exactly what he requested in his own budget. For instance, the annual payment to Egypt that had been every federal budget since 1987, at this exact amount, as a result of the Camp David accords.
